Welcome to Hygieia, a point-based reward system application. By using Hygieia, you agree to abide by the following terms and conditions: Terms and Conditions 
4. Point System: Hygieia operates a point-based reward system. Points are awarded based on user activities within the application. Hygieia reserves the right to modify, suspend, or terminate the point system at any time without prior notice. 
3. Account Registration: To access certain features of Hygieia, you may be required to register for an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password and for restricting access to your device. You agree to accept responsibility for all activities that occur under your account or password. 
2. Use License: Permission is granted to download one copy of the Hygieia application on a single device for personal, non-commercial use only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title. 
1. Acceptance of Terms: By accessing or using the Hygieia application, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions, our Privacy Policy, and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this application. 
5. Prohibited Activities: You agree not to engage in any of the following prohibited activities: 
- Violating any applicable laws or regulations. 
- Impersonating any person or entity or falsely stating or otherwise misrepresenting your affiliation with a person or entity. 
- Interfering with or disrupting the operation of Hygieia or servers or networks connected to Hygieia. 
6. Disclaimer: Hygieia is provided on an as isand as availablebasis, with all faults and without warranty of any kind. We make no warranties, express or implied, regarding the accuracy, adequacy, timeliness, completeness, reliability, or usefulness of any information provided by Hygieia. 
8. Modifications: Hygieia may revise these terms of service for its application at any time without notice. By using Hygieia, you are agreeing to be bound by the then-current version of these Terms and Conditions. /> </LinearLayout> </ScrollView>

Limitations: In no event shall Hygieia or its suppliers be liable for any damages arising out of the use or inability to use Hygieia, even if Hygieia or a Hygieia authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage. Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy outlines the types of personal information that Hygieia collects and how we use it: 
3. Data Security: Hygieia takes reasonable precautions to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. 
2. Use of Information: The information we collect is used to operate and improve Hygieia and to personalize your experience. We may also use your information to communicate with you, such as to send you updates or respond to inquiries. 
1. Information Collection: Hygieia collects personal information, such as your name and email address, when you register for an account. We may also collect non-personal information, such as your device type and IP address. 
By using Hygieia, you consent to the terms of this Privacy Policy. 
5. Contact Us: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at hygieia@gmail.com 
4. Changes to Privacy Policy: Hygieia reserves the right to update or change this Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting the updated Privacy Policy on the Hygieia application. Select the LGU unit nearest to your location
